DOC.brief_title: Tension THERABAND® Kinesiology Tape Shoulder Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine effectiveness standard tension Thera-Band® Kinesiological Tape ( TB-KT ) application versus vary tension shoulder pain , disability , recovery speed in-office rehabilitative program . A convenience sample size 38 new patient current shoulder pain recruit study . Patients must test within first 2 3 therapy visit , diagnosis shoulder pain , 18-64 year old , corticosteroid treatment within last two week , post-surgical case exclude , patient may pregnant . Upon agree study , patient sign inform consent , complete demographic questionnaire , complete specific outcome measure assessment . The outcome measure include Numeric Pain Rating Scale ( NPRS ) Penn Shoulder Score ( PENN ) . After complete initial paperwork , patient randomize two group , control intervention . The Control group receive standard FUNHAB® in-office care addition standard TB-KT tap technique . The Intervention group receive standard FUNHAB® in-office care plus vary tension application TB-KT . The TB-KT applied shoulder complex influence proper activation rotator cuff muscle , specifically supraspinatus infraspinatus . The tape apply `` I '' strip vertebral border scapula less tubercle humerus . Over course 4 week , tension tape systemically increase . At begin week tape reapplied , pain rating record . At conclusion 4 week patient complete PENN .
DOC.criteria: test within first 2 3 therapy visit , diagnosis shoulder pain , 1864 year old Corticosteroid treatment within last two week , postsurgical case , pregnancy
